title: "Cedars-Sinai Secures NIH Grant to Use AI in Measuring Cardiac Risk"
excerpt: "The Los Angeles-based health system is using a $7 million federal grant to expand a digital health program that will develop AI tools to help providers analyze a patient's risk of heart attack and other cardiac concerns."
